May 23, 1986 D Grotton (Whit Friday)
Grotton (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Saddleworth grotton-whit-friday
Grotton Hotel, Oldham Best local - 1st Britsh Aerospace, 2nd Boarshurst. Best section 3/4 - 1st Meltham, 2nd St Johns Mossley. Best youth - 1st Mossley Hollins, 2nd Wardle. 46 bands competed.
